edited_stories.edited_story_text: It was a beautiful city. The streets were full of people, bustling up and down, back and forth throughout the day. The shops, filled with patrons, were warm and cozy to visit. Each of the buildings, aged and refined, developed a personality over the years. A treasure, out in the open, cherished and unnoticed.
